## boxicity
* [â†—](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boxicity) The boxicity of a graph is the minimum dimension in which a given graph can be represented as an intersection graph of axis-parallel boxes.
* [Tran2022](../uXViPE): The boxicity of a graph $G$ is the minimum amount of interval graphs required, such that their intersecten results in $G$
